Package org.radarbase.management.repository

Interface UserRepository

All Superinterfaces:
org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<User,Long>, org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<User,Long>, org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaSpecificationExecutor<User>, org.springframework.data.repository.PagingAndSortingRepository<User,Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.query.QueryByExampleExecutor<User>, org.springframework.data.repository.Repository<User,Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.history.RevisionRepository<User,Long,Integer>
@RepositoryDefinition(domainClass=User.class, idClass=java.lang.Long.class) public interface UserRepository extends org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<User,Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.history.RevisionRepository<User,Long,Integer>, org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaSpecificationExecutor<User>
Spring Data JPA repository for the User entity.
